actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, to include in the definition of law enforcement the enforcement of laws, ordinances, and regulations in any State relative to environmental recreation, including parks.

summary.text: Includes within the definition of law enforcement, under the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act, the enforcement of laws, ordinances, and regulations in any State relative to environmental recreation, including parks. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 3781 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, to include in the definition of law enforcement the enforcement of laws, ordinances, and regulations in any State relative to environmental recreation, including parks.
